PcStatus.Comments: Tensabarrier Post Configurator. Version A.1.00 Developed by Simon Goodman 09/10/2012. Notes. The company references in the code (On leave page1) to validate part is in the parts master will need updating when exported + FG Description lookup.

PcDocRules.RuleExpr: The target entity is equal to OrderDtl value
The target entity is equal to QuoteDtl value
The target entity is equal to JobHead value

PcDocRulesExpr.LValue: QuoteDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;
OrderDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;

PcDynLst.Condition: return Inputs.chk_dualcustomwebbing.Value == false && Inputs.chk_websearchondual.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "ROLL";
return Inputs.chk_dualcustomwebbing.Value == true && Inputs.chk_websearchondual.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "ROLL";
return Inputs.chk_dualcustomwebbing.Value == false && Inputs.chk_websearchondual.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "CUT";
return Inputs.chk_dualcustomwebbing.Value == true && Inputs.chk_websearchondual.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "CUT";
return Inputs.chk_customwebbing.Value == false && Inputs.chk_websearchon.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "ROLL";
return Inputs.chk_customwebbing.Value == true && Inputs.chk_websearchon.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "ROLL";
return Inputs.chk_customwebbing.Value == false && Inputs.chk_websearchon.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "CUT";
return Inputs.chk_customwebbing.Value == true && Inputs.chk_websearchon.Value == false && Inputs.cmb_webformat.Value == "CUT";

PcInputs.OnLeave2:
/* Determines the Folder with the CSV Files */
run ud\test\FileLookUp.p ("\\EPICORAPP1\Epicor905\Server\ud\GroupCSVReferences\GroupCSVFolderRef.csv","Folder_Ref",GetCurrentCompany(), output var_csvfolder ).

PcInputsExpr.Expression:
if (Inputs.chk_nolabel.Value == true) {Inputs.cmb_labelselect.Value="";}
// if Inputs.chk_nolabel.Value = True then Inputs.cmb_labelselect.Value="".

if (Inputs.chk_partverificationon.Value==false) {Inputs.var_bomvalidity.Value = "** WARNING ** Bom verification is switched OFF.";}
// if Inputs.chk_partverificationon.Value=false then Inputs.var_bomvalidity.Value = "** WARNING ** Bom verification is switched OFF.".

return !(Inputs.cmb_postselection.Value == "Stowaway SA1" && Inputs.rbn_stowawayqty.Value != "" || Inputs.cmb_postselection.Value != "Stowaway SA1" && Inputs.cmb_baseselection.Value != "" && Inputs.cmb_webbingfinish.Value == "");
return !(Inputs.chk_duallineoption.Value == true && Inputs.chr_webbingtype.Value == "" && Inputs.cmb_dualcassetteselection.Value != "No Cassette" && Inputs.cmb_dualcassetteselection.Value != "");
